dotnetType.name: TimeSpanResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver that matches <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.DurationResolution" /> result if the type is <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />;
            an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimeSpanResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
